I'm your personal finance assistant! Here's what I can help you with:

• **Record Expenses**: Tell me what you spent money on (e.g., "I spent RM25 on lunch")

• **View Spending**: Get summaries of your spending by category or time period
• **Savings Advice**: Get personalized tips on how to save money
• **Daily Tracking**: Log your daily expenses to build better financial habits

- "I spent RM45 on groceries"
- "Show me my recent expenses"
- "Set a RM500 budget for food"
- "How am I doing on my budget?"
